TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is an NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She is represented before the Court by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant applied to the Mayor of PERSON for a farmhouse building permit on DATE .
ORG rejected the request on DATE because a modification of the city plan forbade new buildings in the areas in question .

On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal against this decision with ORG , asking for it to be quashed and for a declaration of her right to obtain the building permit . She alleged that the decision of ORG was unlawful because , before the approval of the modification of the city plan by ORG , she had made written submissions to obtain a building permit in those areas which had been considered by ORG to fall within the modified city plan .
On DATE the ORG quashed the decision of ORG on the basis of the reasons stated by the applicant , but rejected the request to declare that she had a right to obtain the building permit .
The applicant sent a copy of the judgment to ORG on DATE . No appeal was lodged by ORG and the judgment became final on DATE .
In the meantime , on DATE , ORG had approved new modifications of the city plan in relation to the areas in question .
On the basis of the judgment of ORG , the applicant asked ORG for a building permit , but ORG did not reply .

In relation to the delays in complying with the decision of ORG , on DATE the applicant filed enforcement proceedings ( ricorso per l’ottemperanza ) with the same ORG for enforcement of the judgment of DATE . The applicant requested ORG to find that the first judgment had not been enforced and to appoint a special commissioner ( commissario ad acta ) to enforce it .

On DATE ORG admitted the claim and ordered ORG to comply fully with the judgment of DATE within DATE from the communication of the decision . The ORG also appointed a special commissioner who was to intervene if , upon expiry of the DATE period , ORG had not granted the permit . The commissioner was empowered to take the necessary measures to ensure compliance with the decision within DATE . ORG held that the further modifications approved by ORG on DATE were not an obstacle to granting the building permit because the administrative proceedings for their approval had not ended when the judgment of ORG of DATE became final .
ORG lodged an appeal against the judgment of DATE of ORG before the PERSON , asking for it to be quashed .

On DATE the Consiglio di Stato granted the appeal and rejected the application for enforcement . The Consiglio di Stato alleged that the new modifications to the city plan approved on DATE were an obstacle to granting the building permit , even if the administrative proceedings for approval had not ended when the judgment of CARDINAL DATE of ORG had become final .
